actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permit Medicare select policies in all States and to modify the requirements with respect to such policies.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 to: (1) make permanent the Medicare select policy program; and (2) allow access to Medicare select policies in all States. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise the Medicare select policy program and provide for a civil penalty for misrepresentations made in connection with a Medicare select policy.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permit Medicare select policies in all States and to modify the requirements with respect to such policies.
